# Só treino

## Leitura

```{r}
df <- read_csv(
  'dados/train_limpo.csv'
)
```

```{r}
df %>% glimpse()
```


## Split

```{r}
split <- initial_split(df, strata = survived)
treino <- training(split)
teste <- testing(split)
```


## Workflow e modelo

```{r}
modelo <- 
  logistic_reg() %>% 
  set_engine('glm')
```

```{r}
wf <- 
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(modelo)

wf
```
